This balance ensures that the government does not overstep its role in promoting religious practices, allowing individuals to make their own choices. Ultimately, this approach contributes to a more inclusive and harmonious society.

By doing so, governments can ensure that cultural traditions thrive without compromising the values of equality and fairness.
